named-query.name: Order.findAllOrders
named-query.query: select o from Order o order by o.ordered,o.required

named-query.name: Order.findCancelledOrders
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.status='CANCELLED'

named-query.name: Order.findAllOrdersExceptCancelledShipped
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.status not in ('SHIPPED','CANCELLED') order by o.ordered

named-query.name: Order.findOrdersByIds
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.id in (:ids) and o.status not in ('SHIPPED','CANCELLED') order by o.ordered
